task.title: How to Clean the Kitchen
task.shortdesc: If you have made yourself breakfast, here's how to clean up. Or if you just want to clean something. We won't complain.

step.cmd: Put away the food you used where you found it
Put your dishes in the diswasher
step.info: Pots and pans do not go in the dishwasher, nor do utensils with wooden parts, the pink knives, or the ice cream scoop. If you're not sure, don't do it.

step.cmd: Hand wash the items that can't go in the dishwasher
Put the hand washed dishes in the drying rack
Wipe down the counters with a sponge
